text:
@NYGovCuomo @MarkGenthner This is a pretty legit + valid point 
Can you now explain to all of us why you essentially sentenced almost all the nursing home patients to death with your Chinese Wuhan Corona Covid19 Virus response - we would all actually love to hear your legit answer
